Installation notes¶

shtns¶

Download and decompress the sources, go in the root directory and run something like:

./configure --prefix=$HOME/.local --enable-openmp --enable-python
make

Then:

make install

or to install just for the user:

python setup.py install --user

or, activate a virtual environment and:

python setup.py install
